page.title: 07Draycott Parish Council
page.content:
Most of the area is in the parish of Draycott in the Clay, the remainder is divided between Marchington and Newborough. There are 558 people on the Draycott Electoral Register.
The{Draycott parish council}meets monthly at the village hall, its meetings are formal but villagers who attend are encouraged to contribute. In 1985 the parish council set a rate precept of 2.8 pence in the pound, raising about Â£1,800 for administering the parish. The cost to the ratepayer for a typical 4 bedroom detached house would be Â£10. By comparison the annual rates for the district council are Â£55 and for the county council Â£550.
Ivan Lawrence is the Conservative member of parliament for the constituency of East Staffordshire.
